title: Random pc crash
body:
Pretty funny story, i finally resolve my error 004 problem and in the first 5 matches i do 3 of them my pc completely crash in the middle of the game.
I tried to make him crash using Google or some others game it didnt crash only with league.
Now I have 20 minutes of waiting when lol is making my pc crash, how is that my fault???
Would like if someone help me.
(Porocles where are u now that are i need u :c)

replies.body: I'm here!!  The error you're referring to is not a very clear notification, but it's most commonly caused by connection problems.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and get back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions!

You are not getting there, my pc crashes like freezes and i have to turn it off and on...
Happen right now in a poro king mode. 
I dont know what to do.

Does the freeze have an error or do you have to manually turn it off?  Do you have Windows 10?  An update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) that's been causing total freezes.  Disable that and see if it works.  Do it in a custom game!
Porocles i disabled it and it still crashed please help
Sorry but i still cant play, it always crashs after some minutes of game...

I disabled it, and it still crashed after 25 minutes in a costume game...
More options?

Hi Porocles, I know this is the wrong place to post this, but I'm new to the forums and didn't have another idea on how to contact you.

I would really like to have you, or another part of the support team, read my post. It's very in depth and detailed, and I would just like to make sure someone on the Dev team that can impact decisions and changes sees it. That was what I was told to do in an email from Support. Sorry for the improper method of contact.

It just freeze my pc i cant do nothing, I have to manually turn it off.
Yes, i have windows 10 i will try what your saying.
Omg how did you resolve your 004 message?!? I'm having that problem right now.

i tried everything, but the only thing that worked was using hextech repair tool and active the unnistall option to delete everything and reinstall it.
hope i helped.
